title: Become a Beta Tester for World Scribe Web!

description.__html:
We're excited to announce that World Scribe will soon be coming to the web as a web app!
This new app will have all of the Android version's functionality, alongside new features such as custom Categories.

Before the app launches, we want YOUR help to make it better. If you're interested in becoming a beta tester, please send an email from a Gmail account to:

averistudios@gmail.com
The subject line of the email MUST begin with BETA-SIGNUP.

The app uses Google Authentication, so the email MUST be from a Gmail account.
Also note that due to server load, we cannot always guarantee a spot on the team. We will respond to you via email to let you know if you've been accepted or not.

Q: Will development of the Android app be abandoned?
A: Nope! The Android app will continue receiving updates for bug fixes and other small improvements. However, major new features will likely go to the web app instead.
